sen.j: 鷹司 房煕（たかつかさ ふさひろ、宝永7年8月13日 (旧暦)（1710年9月6日） - 享保15年4月24日 (旧暦)（1730年6月9日））は江戸時代の公卿。
sen.e: Fusahiro TAKATSUKASA (September 6, 1710 - June 9, 1730) was kugyo (high court noble) in the Edo period.
Fusahiro TAKATSUKASA (September 6, 1710 - June 9, 1730) was a Court noble who lived during the Edo period.
sen.cmt: 公卿を Court nobleとし、また 用語統一の「レビュー結果」（2009/7/31）に従い、inの部分を who lived duringに修正致しました。
sen.e: Fusahiro TAKATSUKASA (September 6, 1710 - June 9, 1730) was a Court noble who lived during the Edo period.
His father was Iehiro KONOE.
His father was Iehiro KONOE.
His father was Iehiro KONOE.
His mother was a daughter of Kanekazu MACHIJIRI.
His mother was a daughter of Kanekazu MACHIJIRI.
His mother was a daughter of Kanekazu MACHIJIRI.
He was adopted by Hisasuke TAKATSUKASA.
He was adopted by Hisasuke TAKATSUKASA.
He was adopted by Hisasuke TAKATSUKASA.
His alias was Seijorinin.
He called himself Seijorinin.
He called himself Seijorinin.
His court official rank was Junii (Junior Second Rank).
His court official rank was Junii (Junior Second Rank).
His court official rank was Junii (Junior Second Rank).

sen.j: 宝永7年（1710年）に近衛家熙の子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born to Iehiro KONOE in 1710.
He was born to Iehiro KONOE in 1710.
He was born to Iehiro KONOE in 1710.

sen.j: 鷹司兼熙の養子となり、内大臣（1728年 - 1730年）を歴任。
sen.e: He was adopted by Kanehiro TAKATSUKASA and held various posts such as Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1728 - 1730).
He was adopted by Kanehiro TAKATSUKASA and held various posts such as Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1728 - 1730).
He was adopted by Kanehiro TAKATSUKASA and held various posts such as Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1728 - 1730).
He died in 1730.
He died in 1730.
He died in 1730.
